SetLock.name: SetLock
SetLock.description: Set the lock to the current inline text content control: either locks the content from editing, or from deleting the control, or both.

params.name: sLockType
params.description: The type of the lock applied to the inline text content control.

GetLock.name: GetLock
GetLock.description: Get the lock type of this container

SetTag.name: SetTag
SetTag.description: Add a string tag to the current inline text content control.

params.name: sTag
params.description: The tag which will be added to the current inline text content control.

GetTag.name: GetTag
GetTag.description: Get the tag attribute for this container

SetLabel.name: SetLabel
SetLabel.description: Add a string label to the current inline text content control.

params.name: sLabel
params.description: The label which will be added to the current inline text content control. Can be a positive or negative integer from -2147483647 to 2147483647.

GetLabel.name: GetLabel
GetLabel.description: Get the label attribute for this container

SetAlias.name: SetAlias
SetAlias.description: Set the alias attribute for this container

GetAlias.name: GetAlias
GetAlias.description: Get the alias attribute for this container

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description:
Get the number of elements in the current inline text content control. The text content
control is created with one text run present in it by default, so any even without any
element added this method will return the value of '1'.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Get the element of the current inline text content control using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the element which content we want to get must be located.

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Remove the element using the position specified from the current inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element which we want to remove from the current inline text content control.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Remove all the elements from the current inline text content control.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Add an element to the inline text content control.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the position specified. Returns false if the type of oElement is not supported by an inline text content control.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the element where it will be added to the current inline text content control. If this value is not specified then the element will be added to the end of the current inline text content control.

comment:
/**
	 * Class represent a container for the elements of a paragraph
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class represent a container for the elements of a paragraph
